variant.p: The disclosures below apply in addition to those in IFRS 16. In accordance with IFRS 16, the owner of an investment property provides lessors’ disclosures about leases into which it has entered. A lessee that holds an investment property as a right-of-use asset provides lessees’ disclosures as required by IFRS 16 and lessors’ disclosures as required by IFRS 16 for any operating leases into which it has entered .
